title: How to establish a perfect balance between technology and spirituality - Quora

response.answer_text: Adopting a proven method of spiritual learning is the technology of spirituality. Science technology is not applicable to spiritual learning except by use of internet, telecommunications and video calls for one-to-one and not group mass distant learning.

It is only my opinion (which, as you know are like a**holes, everybody has one) but I think technology gets in the way of becoming a more spiritual being however if you find out differently, would you let me know?
